analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi
sani dassana ttikaḥ upādāna duka ādi

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ noupādānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho upādāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na sa nidassana sa ppaṭigham no upādānam dhammam paṭicca anidassana appaṭighaḥ upādānaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta
